title: Once We Get Married
overview: Fashion buyer Gu Sisi buys couture wedding dresses for his clients. At one of the receptions, she meets Yin Sichen, who came to discuss business cooperation. After one incident, young people enter into a contract marriage. Can two opposites come to an agreement and find true love? ‎Based on the novel by Xiang Wang "The wife under the contract of the CEO".‎
